trans-unit.source: Provides data for the <see cref="E:Microsoft.Build.Framework.IEventSource.AnyEventRaised" /> event.
trans-unit.target: 为 <see cref="E:Microsoft.Build.Framework.IEventSource.AnyEventRaised" /> 事件提供数据。

trans-unit.source: The <xref:Microsoft.Build.Framework.BuildEventArgs> class is an abstract base class for all <xref:Microsoft.Build.Framework> event argument classes.
trans-unit.target: <xref:Microsoft.Build.Framework.BuildEventArgs>类是所有的抽象基类<xref:Microsoft.Build.Framework>事件自变量类。

trans-unit.source: The following example shows how to write a basic logger that responds to build events.
trans-unit.target: 下面的示例演示如何编写基本记录器对应生成事件。

trans-unit.source: Initializes a new instance of the <see cref="T:Microsoft.Build.Framework.BuildEventArgs" /> class.
trans-unit.target: 初始化 <see cref="T:Microsoft.Build.Framework.BuildEventArgs" /> 类的新实例。

trans-unit.source: Initializes a new instance of the <see cref="T:Microsoft.Build.Framework.BuildEventArgs" /> class.
trans-unit.target: 初始化 <see cref="T:Microsoft.Build.Framework.BuildEventArgs" /> 类的新实例。

trans-unit.source: This implementation of the <xref:Microsoft.Build.Framework.BuildEventArgs> constructor takes no parameters, and sets the <xref:Microsoft.Build.Framework.BuildEventArgs.Timestamp*> property to <xref:System.DateTime.Now%2A> and the <xref:Microsoft.Build.Framework.BuildEventArgs.ThreadId%2A> property to the current thread.
trans-unit.target: 此实现的<xref:Microsoft.Build.Framework.BuildEventArgs>构造函数不采用任何参数，并设置<xref:Microsoft.Build.Framework.BuildEventArgs.Timestamp*>属性<xref:System.DateTime.Now%2A>和<xref:Microsoft.Build.Framework.BuildEventArgs.ThreadId%2A>到当前线程的属性。

trans-unit.source: The text of the event.
trans-unit.target: 事件的文本。

trans-unit.source: The Help keyword associated with the event.
trans-unit.target: 与事件关联的“帮助”关键字。

trans-unit.source: The source of the event.
trans-unit.target: 事件源。

trans-unit.source: Initializes a new instance of the <see cref="T:Microsoft.Build.Framework.BuildEventArgs" /> class with the specified <see cref="P:Microsoft.Build.Framework.BuildEventArgs.Message" />, <see cref="P:Microsoft.Build.Framework.BuildEventArgs.HelpKeyword" />, and <see cref="P:Microsoft.Build.Framework.BuildEventArgs.SenderName" /> values.
trans-unit.target: 用指定的 <see cref="T:Microsoft.Build.Framework.BuildEventArgs" />、<see cref="P:Microsoft.Build.Framework.BuildEventArgs.Message" /> 和 <see cref="P:Microsoft.Build.Framework.BuildEventArgs.HelpKeyword" /> 值初始化 <see cref="P:Microsoft.Build.Framework.BuildEventArgs.SenderName" /> 类的新实例。

trans-unit.source: The text of the event.
trans-unit.target: 事件的文本。

trans-unit.source: The Help keyword associated with the event.
trans-unit.target: 与事件关联的“帮助”关键字。

trans-unit.source: The source of the event.
trans-unit.target: 事件源。

trans-unit.source: The date and time to associate with the event.
trans-unit.target: 与该事件关联的日期和时间。

trans-unit.source: Initializes a new instance of the <see cref="T:Microsoft.Build.Framework.BuildEventArgs" /> class.
trans-unit.target: 初始化 <see cref="T:Microsoft.Build.Framework.BuildEventArgs" /> 类的新实例。

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets location contextual information.
trans-unit.target: 获取或设置位置上下文信息。

trans-unit.source: This is attached to logging events to define where they are located in relation to the process, engine, project, target, or task that is executing.
trans-unit.target: 这连接到记录事件以定义其相对于正在执行的进程、引擎、项目、目标或任务的位置。

trans-unit.source: A <see cref="T:Microsoft.Build.Framework.BuildEventContext" /> object representing the location contextual information.
trans-unit.target: 一个 <see cref="T:Microsoft.Build.Framework.BuildEventContext" /> 对象，表示位置上下文信息。

trans-unit.source: Gets the Help keyword for the event.
trans-unit.target: 获取事件的“帮助”关键字。

trans-unit.source: The Help keyword for the event.
trans-unit.target: 事件的“帮助”关键字。

trans-unit.source: Gets the message for the event.
trans-unit.target: 获取事件的消息。

trans-unit.source: The message for the event.
trans-unit.target: 事件的消息。

trans-unit.source: The following example shows how to write a basic logger that responds to build events.
trans-unit.target: 下面的示例演示如何编写基本记录器对应生成事件。

trans-unit.source: Gets the name of the <see cref="T:System.Object" /> raising the event.
trans-unit.target: 获取引发事件的 <see cref="T:System.Object" /> 的名称。

trans-unit.source: The name of the <see cref="T:System.Object" /> raising the event.
trans-unit.target: 引发事件的 <see cref="T:System.Object" /> 的名称。

trans-unit.source: Gets an integer identifier for the thread that raised the event.
trans-unit.target: 获取引发事件的线程的整数标识符。

trans-unit.source: An integer identifier for the thread that raised the event.
trans-unit.target: 引发事件的线程的整数标识符。

trans-unit.source: Gets the time the event was raised as a <see cref="T:System.DateTime" />.
trans-unit.target: 获取 <see cref="T:System.DateTime" /> 形式的事件引发时间。

trans-unit.source: The time the event was raised as a <see cref="T:System.DateTime" />.
trans-unit.target: <see cref="T:System.DateTime" /> 形式的事件引发时间。
